name: retrieveRecording
description: Retrieve a recording from the authenticated user's recordings

$ul: **call_leg_id**: If a call recording, uniquely identifies the recorded call leg
**call_session_id**: If a call recording, uniquely identifies the recorded call session
**channels**: When `dual`, final audio file has the first leg on channel A, and the rest on channel B.
**conference_id**: If a conference recording, uniquely identifies the recorded conference
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the recording was created
**download_urls**: The links to download the recording files
**mp3**: Link to download the recording in mp3 format
**wav**: Link to download the recording in wav format
**duration_millis**: The duration of the recording in milliseconds
**recording_ended_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the recording ended
**recording_started_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the recording started
**source**: The kind of event that led to this recording being created
**status**: The status of the recording. Only resources for `completed` recordings are currently supported
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the recording was last updated
